TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SendPacketsElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 陣列中的元素。

span.span: Represents an element in a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來增強達到最高的效能時，用於非同步網路 I/O 的伺服器應用程式所使用的類別。The class is used to enhance the class for use by server applications that use asynchronous network I/O to achieve the highest performance. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定要傳送檔案或資料緩衝區使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

threadsafe.span: 這個類別的執行個體都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Instances of this class are thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A byte array of data to send using the method.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別資料的位元組陣列。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a byte array of data. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定要傳送檔案或資料緩衝區使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

span.span: The parameter cannot be null

param.span: 要使用 方法傳輸之檔案的檔名。

span.span: The filename of the file to be transmitted using the method.

summary.span: 使用指定的檔案，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的新執行個體檔案的檔案名稱的類別。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a filename of a file. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定要傳送檔案或資料緩衝區使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method. 支援通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑`filepath`參數。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the `filepath` parameter. 如果檔案是在目前工作目錄，就必須指定沒有路徑資訊。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified.

span.span: The parameter cannot be null

new System.Net.Sockets.SendPacketsElement : byte[] * int * int -> System.Net.Sockets.SendPacketsElement

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要使用 方法傳送之資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array of data to send using the method.

param.name: offset
param.span: 位移 (以位元組為單位)，從 buffer 的開頭到 buffer 中的位置 (buffer 參數中指定開始傳送資料的位置)。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer to the location in the buffer to start sending the data specified in the buffer parameter.

param.name: count
param.span: 從 offset 參數開始，要傳送的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes to send starting from the offset parameter.

param.span: 如果 count 為零，就不會傳送任何位元組。

span.span: If count is zero, no bytes are sent.

summary.span: 使用指定的緩衝區、緩衝區位移和計數，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified buffer, buffer offset, and count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別資料的位元組陣列。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a byte array of data. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定要傳送檔案或資料緩衝區使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

span.span: The parameter cannot be null

exception.span: 和 參數必須大於或等於零。

span.span: The and parameters must be greater than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 和 必須小於緩衝區的大小

span.span: The and must be less than the size of the buffer

param.name: filepath
param.span: 要使用 方法傳輸之檔案的檔名。

span.span: The filename of the file to be transmitted using the method.

param.name: offset
param.span: 位移 (以位元組為單位)，從檔案的開頭到 filepath 參數中指定開始傳送檔案的位置。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the file to the location in the file to start sending the file specified in the filepath parameter.

param.name: count
param.span: 從 offset 參數開始，要傳送的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes to send starting from the offset parameter.

param.span: 如果 count 為零，就會傳送整個檔案。

span.span: If count is zero, the entire file is sent.

summary.span: 使用指定的檔名路徑、位移和計數，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified filename path, offset, and count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的新執行個體檔案的檔案名稱的類別。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a filename of a file. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定要傳送檔案或資料緩衝區使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method. 支援通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑`filepath`參數。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the `filepath` parameter. 如果檔案是在目前工作目錄，就必須指定沒有路徑資訊。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified.

span.span: The parameter cannot be null

exception.span: 和 參數必須大於或等於零。

span.span: The and parameters must be greater than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 和 必須小於 參數所指定檔案的大小。

span.span: The and must be less than the size of the file indicated by the parameter.

new System.Net.Sockets.SendPacketsElement : byte[] * int * int * bool -> System.Net.Sockets.SendPacketsElement

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要使用 方法傳送之資料的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array of data to send using the method.

param.name: offset
param.span: 位移 (以位元組為單位)，從 buffer 的開頭到 buffer 中的位置 (buffer 參數中指定開始傳送資料的位置)。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer to the location in the buffer to start sending the data specified in the buffer parameter.

param.name: count
param.span: 從 offset 參數開始，要傳送的位元組數目。

span.span: The number bytes to send starting from the offset parameter.

param.span: 如果 count 為零，就不會傳送任何位元組。

span.span: If count is zero, no bytes are sent.

param.name: endOfPacket
param.span: 布林值，指定這個元素是否要和下一個元素合併於通訊端層對傳輸提出的同一個傳送要求中。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies that this element should not be combined with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.

param.span: 這個旗標可用來更精細地控制資料包上或訊息導向通訊端上每個訊息的內容。

span.span: This flag is used for granular control of the content of each message on a datagram or message-oriented socket.

summary.span: 使用指定的緩衝區、緩衝區位移和計數，並指定是否要將此元素和下一個元素合併於通訊端層對傳輸提出的同一個傳送要求中，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified buffer, buffer offset, and count with an option to combine this element with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.

span.span: The and parameters must be greater than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 和 必須小於緩衝區的大小

summary.span: 取得位移 (以位元組為單位)，這是從資料緩衝區或檔案的開頭，到緩衝區或檔案中要開始傳送資料的位置。

span.span: Gets the offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the data buffer or file to the location in the buffer or file to start sending the data.

value.span: 位移 (以位元組為單位)，這是從資料緩衝區或檔案的開頭，到緩衝區或檔案中要開始傳送資料的位置。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the data buffer or file to the location in the buffer or file to start sending the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為屬性是如果類別不使用初始化`offset`參數。The default value for the property is zero if the class was not initialized with an `offset` parameter.
